title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: Strengthening Social Presence in Online Science Learning through Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning environment utilization skills, secondary-level science knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners must recognize their social presence at 80%+ through regular interactions with peers on online discussion boards
Learners must participate at least three times in science project-based learning activities using digital collaboration tools
Learners must adapt to asynchronous feedback systems and respond 100% to peer evaluations and instructor feedback within two weeks
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
